items.label: Check License Expiry/Exchange
items.description: If Non-EU, book appointment at Commune immediately.

items.label: Buy a Parking Disc
items.description: Cost €2 at any petrol station. Saves you €25 fines.

items.label: Spot the Priority Sign
items.description: Look for the Yellow Diamond (You have priority) vs X sign (Priority to Right).

items.label: Consider Car Sharing
items.description: Apps like Cambio or Poppy might be cheaper than owning a car.
